allow: Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sudo wg show")

Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sudo sysctl -w net.ipv4.ip_forward=1")

Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "grep -q ''^net.ipv4.ip_forward=1'' /etc/sysctl.conf && echo ''Already configured'' || echo ''net.ipv4.ip_forward=1'' | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sudo wg show wg0 transfer")

Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "ip route show table all | grep wg0")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sudo ufw status")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sudo wg show wg0")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sudo iptables -t nat -L -v -n | grep -A 5 POSTROUTING")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "dmesg | tail -30 | grep -i ''firewall\|drop\|reject''")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sudo iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -s 10.8.0.0/24 -o eth0 -j MASQUERADE")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sysctl net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter && sysctl net.ipv4.conf.eth0.rp_filter && sysctl net.ipv4.conf.wg0.rp_filter")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "timeout 5 bash -c ''echo test | nc -u -w1 10.8.0.2 12345'' 2>&1; echo ''Test complete''")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "ip route get 8.8.8.8")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sudo iptables -t nat -D POSTROUTING 1")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sudo iptables -t nat -I POSTROUTING 1 -o eth0 -j MASQUERADE")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "ip route get 8.8.8.8 from 10.8.0.2")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sudo iptables -t nat -D POSTROUTING 2")

Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sudo iptables -t nat -L POSTROUTING -v -n -x && echo ''===FORWARD==='' && sudo iptables -L FORWARD -v -n -x | head -5 && echo ''===WIREGUARD==='' && sudo wg show wg0")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "timeout 10 sudo cat /sys/class/net/wg0/statistics/rx_packets; sleep 2; sudo cat /sys/class/net/wg0/statistics/rx_packets")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "ip -s link show wg0")
Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "for i in 1 2 3 4 5; do echo ''===Check $i===''; sudo wg show wg0 | tail -3; sleep 1; done")

Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "echo ''Server expects:'' && sudo cat /etc/wireguard/wg0.conf | grep ''PublicKey'' && echo ''Lana public key file:'' && sudo cat /etc/wireguard/lana_public.key")

Bash(sshpass -p "jay" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no jay@192.168.254.134 "sudo bash -c ''cat >> /etc/wireguard/wg0.conf << EOF

# Test Client (Jay laptop)
[Peer]
PublicKey = EwnDcutQB/2xu8I5abNyLJLGygA6AbB3JGFJjwYP6DU=
AllowedIPs = 10.8.0.3/32
EOF
'' && sudo cat /etc/wireguard/wg0.conf")
